title: Please Please Please let us mute pings.
body: Seriously.. just the ability to mute pings would be so good. So many games lately I have had the ping spammers and there is no escape, at most I can mute pings all together which is annoying on it's own but I still have the chat feed rolling with pings and my screen getting spammed with various annoying puncuation, would it be too much to ask for ping muting to specific players?

replies.body:
While it is annoying to have ping spammers (whether it be constantly that they are spamming, or doing the thing where the ping of top of you 1234567 times when you make a misplay), pings are a really important feature of the game. 

Pings (when used correctly) are the best way of letting your team know things, especially with all the of language barriers between players. Many people also mute due toxicity and rely on pings for all the communication. 

Unfortunately, as you have already acknowledged, muting pings is the best you can do.

If they are really beginning to frustrate you, I would [suggest creating/joining a premade group](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) (either for ranked for for norms) so you don't have to put up with things like this.

As an extra note, you can also mute ping volume under sounds in options. You'll still see the visuals, but without audio they lose a lot of their impact. Unfortunately this means all pings from all players, but it's the best option available atm.
